comments.text:
It seems we're not having a bug for this yet, so I'm filing one.

In MailNews you can turn a search across folders into a so-called Saved Search or Search Folder. This can be done either way:
a) from the Search Messages dialog (Advanced Search), using the Save as Search Folder button
b) from the Views menu (View/Messages or View drop-down on the search bar), using Save View as a Folder.

Currently, neither way is documented.
